---
category: news
title: "Kids cartoon characters that use AI to customize responses help children learn"
excerpt: "When the main character of a kids TV show can both listen and respond to viewers by using advances in artificial intelligence, youngsters learn more from the program. That's what my colleagues and I found in a series of peer-reviewed studies."
